text: @WhiteHouse @POTUS When can we expect a plan? All we have is scattered reactions to the latest problem. A thoughtful plan would be helpful. If you would have had one for your "best economy ever" it wouldn't have failed so spectacularly. How many lives could an early coronavirus plan have saved.
